urls.title: Contact numbers | Jetstar
urls.description: Hello! The quickest and easiest way to make changes to your booking is at Manage booking. If you can’ t find what you’ re looking for, please give us a call on one of the numbers listed below. 131 538 charges apply, Monday to Sunday 4001 201 260 charges apply, Monday to Sunday in English, Monday to Friday, 9.00am to 6.00pm (local time) in Mandarin and Cantonese +613 9645 5999 charges apply, Monday to Sunday in English, Monday to Friday, 9.00am to 6.00pm (local time) in Mandarin and Cantonese +852 3192

data.text: @Fauziah_Amri Hi Fauziah, you may contact us at +613 9645 5999. The complete list of contact numbers in Indonesia can be found here: https://t.co/hxkMGwA4BQ. Alternatively, you may send us a DM of your concerns along with your booking reference and full name so we can assist. Thanks -Cy
@martaloboautora Hi Marta, it may be worth noting that the Social Media Team can only respond to messages in English. Are you able to re-tweet your message in English so we can assist? Thanks - Maria
@tttttiaraaaa Thanks for your reply Buah. I appreciate that you would need your suitcase on-board however with the measurements you provided, we are unable to allow it. Thanks - Lee

@tttttiaraaaa Hi Buah, thanks for your tweet. Yes, you can definitely bring your 20 inch suitcase as long it will not exceed the maximum size for carry-on baggage - 56cm (height) x 36cm (width) x 23cm (depth). Thanks - Lee
@hendywijayaa Hi Ranger, sorry you're having difficulties contacting our Telephone Reservations Team. Could you please DM us your concern so we can look into this for you? Thanks - Maria

urls.title: Contact numbers | Jetstar
urls.description: Hello! The quickest and easiest way to make changes to your booking is at Manage booking. If you can’ t find what you’ re looking for, please give us a call on one of the numbers listed below. 131 538 charges apply, Monday to Sunday 4001 201 260 charges apply, Monday to Sunday in English, Monday to Friday, 9.00am to 6.00pm (local time) in Mandarin and Cantonese +613 9645 5999 charges apply, Monday to Sunday in English, Monday to Friday, 9.00am to 6.00pm (local time) in Mandarin and Cantonese +852 3192

data.text: @hendywijayaa Hi Ranger, you can contact our Telephone Reservations Team in Indonesia here: https://t.co/hxkMGwA4BQ. Alternatively, you can provide us more details of your concern and we'll be happy to check on it further. Thanks - Maria
@FrequentFlyer80 Hi there, please know that I've responded to your DM. You may wish to check your inbox. Thanks - Maria
@Prngc1 Hi there, thanks for contacting us. Could you send your tweet in English so we can assist you. Thanks - Jayme

@FrequentFlyer80 Thanks for your Tweet. Could you please DM (direct message) specific information about what has gone wrong along with your booking reference and full name so I can take a look further on this? –M
@pageafternext Hi there. Thanks for replying. I have sent a response to your DM. Thanks - Josh
@pageafternext Thanks for your Tweet. Could you please DM (direct message) the booking reference and your full name so I can take a look further on this? –M
@HafizHakimi_ Hello there, thanks for your tweet. We would love to locate your booking reference, please DM us your full name and flight details. Hope to hear from you soon. Cheers - Lee
@rvnkna Hi there, thanks for your tweet. I’ve responded to your DM with further details. Thanks – Lee

@SandiPermana_ID Hi Sandi, it'll be best to be guided by our approved carry-on dimensions. For your reference, it must fit in the overhead locker and not exceed 56cm (H) x 36cm (W) x 23cm (D). Hope this helps! Best -Kelly
@princessdesy Hi there, I’ve already responded to your DM. You may wish to check your inbox. Best - Maria
@jxxbae9 Hi there, thanks for the tweet. I have now responded to you message via DM. Regards - Joie

data.text: @praky4 Hi Prakash, you can bring your badminton racquet as carry-on baggage as long as it's within your it's within your weight and size restriction. You can check this link for more information: https://t.co/CPnLPKcrPm. Thanks - Maria

@seancole27 Thanks for your tweet, Sean. With the current situation in Hong Kong, please note that your flight to Hanoi is still scheduled to depart on time. Should there be any changes on your flight, you will be notified through SMS or email. Thanks - Josh

@nstorms3 Hi there, I understand that you're concerned about the status of your Hong Kong flight on Saturday. So I could check this for you, kindly DM us your booking reference and full name. Best -Kelly

@EggyAko 2/2 time frame. I'll also recommend clearing your browser's cache and cookies and enabling its pop-up blockers. I can appreciate that this must be frustrating but we thank you for sending us your feedback. I do hope that you'd be able to successfully pay after this. Best -Kelly

@EggyAko 1/2 Hi there, I understand that you're having difficulties paying for your booking through our website. Based on the screenshot, I seems that there had been multiple declined card transactions using your card. What I can advise is to try again using another card after the advised
@interseismic Thanks for your Tweet. We’d love to help to book a flight for you. Any amazing destination in mind? –M

@yankeestation1 Hi Bob, we currently do not offer direct flights from Clark to Ho Chi Minh but Jetstar’s management team is always open to new ideas.  We’re always evaluating our offering and looking for new routes to offer our customers - so we appreciate your comments. Thanks -Cy
@suuurie 2/2 You may also check the flight status of your flight here: https://t.co/BvsWoPGXZL. Regards - Joie

@suuurie 1/2 Hi Surie, I understand that you are concerned about your flight to Hong Kong. Honestly, I'm unable to provide you an exact time when you will be notified for your flight. Rest assured, you will be updated through SMS or email if there would be any changes to your flight.
@Amalia_Isti HI Amalia, thanks for letting us know. I've also responded to your DM. Kindly check your inbox. Best -Kelly :)

@Amalia_Isti Hi Amalia, I understand that you need assistance in correcting your name in the booking. So we could help, kindly send us a DM of your full name in the booking and your booking reference. Best -Kelly
@harsha_iitj08 Hi there. we have responded to your DM. Please check your inbox. Thanks - H

@elimchew Hi Elim, thanks for the tweet and for your wonderful feedback. We'd like to forward this to the relevant department, could you please DM us your booking reference and full name? Regards - Yen
@lawlednahkdnana Hi there. Thanks for your reply. Please note that I have send you our response via DM. Thanks - Josh
@lawlednahkdnana Hi there, I see you're having trouble with your eNETS payment. Are you able to provide a screenshot of the error via DM so we can check? Thanks -Cy

@DianaKMay Hi Diana, thanks for the response. I sincerely apologise I wasn't able to assist you the way you have expected. We value your feedback for further improvement of our services. Regards - Joie
@DianaKMay Hi Diana, we'd like to look into this further for you. So we can see how we're able to assist, kindly send us your booking reference and full name via DM. Thanks -Cy

@DianaKMay Hi Diana, I can appreciate you're disappointed that you experienced another delay to your flight - this time from Hanoi to Ho Chi Minh. Could you please send us a DM of your booking reference and full name so we can assist? Thanks -Cy

@beequadrant Hi Benedictus, thanks for the tweet. We'll be happy to assist with adding wheelchair assistance to your booking. Kindly DM us your booking reference along with your full name so I can check this for you. Regards - Joie

data.text: @ArvinTunas Thanks for tagging us about our operation from Jakarta. We operate our flight to and from Jakarta at Terminal 2F. You can check our website here https://t.co/VbnC6meVcH for more details. Thanks - Jerry

data.text: @ChrisN2678 2/2 however sometimes things like operational requirement/engineering requirement/weather issues mean we must delay your trip. Despite this, I wish you a pleasant flight. Regards - Josh

@ChrisN2678 1/2 Thanks for your tweet today, Christiana. I can see that you are disappointed about the delay of your flight today to Ho Chi Minh City. We understand that changes to your journey are difficult and we apologise for causing any inconvenience,

@tahye_ka 2/2 It’s so rewarding for our team to have their work recognised. We really want to pass this awesome feedback on to our team, can you please send us a DM with your booking reference and some more details. Thanks! - Josh :)

data.text: @boydy43 Thanks for your tweet Scott. I understand that you are unhappy about the cancellation of your flight. I can see that you are already contacting us via our Jetstar Asia Facebook page. I recommend you to respond on our PM to you. Thanks - Josh
@FrequentFlyer80 2/2 We always value customers who are keen to give us their feedback so rest assured that your feedback will be taken care of. Thanks - Josh

data.text: @FrequentFlyer80 1/2 Hi there. Thanks for your tweet. I can see that you are unhappy with your recent experience travelling with us to Da Lat. I appreciate you bringing this to our attention, so that we can deal with this immediately.
@DianaKMay Hi Diana, please know that I've responded to your DM. You may wish to check your inbox. Thanks - Maria

@DianaKMay Hi Diana, thanks for the tweet. I understand that you are seeking a refund of your booking due to the flight cancellation from Hong Kong. We'd like to look into this for you. Kindly DM us your booking reference along with your full name. Regards - Joie

@KamilaAwl Thanks for getting in touch. I understand that you would like us to reschedule your flight. So we can discuss this further, please DM us your booking reference and name listed? We'll see how we can assist. Thanks - Jerry

data.text: @channasilva2000 Hey Channa, thanks for sharing your photo. I hope you enjoyed travelling on one of our upfront seats on your flight from Singapore. :) Cheers - Lee

@yankeestation1 Hi Bob, thanks for your tweet. I'm sorry to hear that you're unhappy with the price quoted to you for the booking. It may help to know that prices aren’t static – they are subject to availability and can change. Thanks - Jayme
@itelpao Hi Liezel, I've responded to your DM. Kindly check your inbox. Thanks - Maria

@ChrisN2678 Hi Chris, thanks for the tweet. I understand that you are requesting a refund of your cancelled flight from Hong Kong to Vietnam. We'd like to look into this for you. Kindly DM us your booking reference along with your full name. Regards - Joie

@veratheplant Hi Vera, I understand that you're having difficulties checking in for your flight JQ 117. Could you please DM us the screenshot of the error you’re experiencing along with your booking reference and full name so we can check this further? Thanks – Maria
@ImPrinceJM Hi Prince. I’ve responded to your DM. Regards – Mariz
@ImPrinceJM Hi Prince, thanks for the tweet. We'll be happy to look into this for you. Just send us a DM along with your booking reference and full name on the booking. Best - Lindsay
@princessdesy Hi Princess, thanks for your tweet. Please DM us your query, booking reference, and full name so we can assist you. Thanks - Lee

data.text: @ayunvts61 Hi Ayu, thanks for your tweet. I would recommend you to purchase baggage before your flight as it would be more expensive at the airport. You can do it on our website here: https://t.co/XdOLvihYbs Thanks - Jayme

@xwangbu Thanks for your tweet Erik. I appreciate how frustrating it is move your flight to a later time and we would like to assist you on this. Please DM us your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Lee
@LazaroHernandez @JetstarAirways @JetstarROBLOX Hi Lazaro. Thanks for your tweet. Please note that I have already replied on your initial tweet. Thanks - Josh

@Ameya_Kamat Hi Ameya, thanks for your tweet. I see you have a query regarding cabin baggage. If you could DM us the details along with your booking reference and full name, we’ll see how we could assist. Thanks -Cy

@samesurya Hi there. I understand that you would like to know if you’re able to reschedule your connecting flight from Bangkok to Jakarta via Singapore, so we can check this kindly send us a DM along with your booking reference and full name. Regards – Mariz

@riskawahyu_f Hi Riska, I understand that you need assistance in correcting the name listed on your booking. So I could check this for you, kindly DM us your booking reference and full name. Regards -Kelly

@anshukhulbe Hi Anusha. We don’t advise passengers to post their personal details publicly including their booking reference, you may wish to delete your tweet. So we can assist, kindly send us a DM. Regards – Mariz
@Arikah_ika Hi there. The social media team are only able to respond to messages in English. Are you able to retweet in English so we can assist? Thanks - H
@kathe2287 Hi kather-pillar, thanks for your tweet. Monopods cannot be carried on but can be part of your checked baggage. Hope this helps. Thanks - Lee

@chalintang Hi Heksa, thanks for your tweet. I understand that you are having difficulty accessing your booking and we would like to look into this for you. Please DM us your booking reference and full name so we can check. Thanks - Lee
@AdelinViolaa 2/2 If you can send through the details and photos to our Baggage Services team here: https://t.co/Ns3im9z6K3 they can formally review this and contact you directly. Thanks - H

@AdelinViolaa 1/2 Hi Adelin. I can understand that your disappointment regarding your damage baggage. Please be assured that we take care of each piece of luggage and to return all your belongings in the condition we received them.
@AdelinViolaa Hi Adelin, Thanks for your tweet. The social media team are only able to respond to posts in English. Are you able to repost in English so we can assist? Thanks - Jayme
@lloydthelostboy Hi Lloyd, advanced Happy Birthday! I’m glad that you’ve chosen to fly with us on your birthday holiday. We’re looking forward to see you on-board soon! Thanks - Maria
Jetstar adds fifth service in response to Okinawa popularity https://t.co/nIU0Ig5TVA https://t.co/PxRITz3Agy

@plain_moshi Hi there, thanks for your tweet. I see you need assistance with updating the passport details on your booking. Kindly send us a DM of your booking reference, full name and passport details so we could assist. Thanks -Cy
@kennypasaribu Hi Kenny, I've responded to your DM. Kindly check your inbox. Cheers! -Kelly

@beretxiu Hi there, thanks for tagging us. You can find our lowest fares via our website and check out all our current promotions here: https://t.co/HM5ef9Vki8. Hope you’re able to book flights soon. Thanks - Maria
@CakrawalaGlobal Hi there. I have responded to your DM. Thanks - Lee

@CakrawalaGlobal Hi there. I understand that your friend was asked to pay to update the name on his/her booking. So we can have look into this, kindly have your friend send us a DM along with their booking reference and full name. Regards – Mariz
@alyarsa Thanks for replying, Alya. Please note that I have responded to your DM. Thanks! - Josh

@hendydwi Thanks for the tweet Hendy. We’ll be glad to assist in updating the name on your booking. So we can do this, kindly send us a DM with your booking reference, full name as listed on the booking along with a copy of your passport. Regards – Mariz
@alyarsa Hi alya, thanks for your tweet. I’ve responded to your DM with further details.

@rishadist Hi Rishad. Our crew performs ad-hoc cleaning as required but it sounds like we didn’t meet our usual standards and I'm sorry this made your journey with us uncomfortable. We appreciate your feedback on this though as this will help us improve our service in the future. -Mariz
@FerinaWidodo Hi Ferina, we've responded to your DM. Best - Lindsay

@jefftagle Hi Jeff. Thanks for understanding still, I’m sorry if there was a delay on our SMS service, we appreciate your feedback on this as this will help us improve our service in the future. Regards – Mariz
@SandiPermana_ID Thanks for tagging us. The Social Media team are only able to respond to messages in English. Are you able to re-tweet in English so we can assist? Thanks - Jerry

@EB_Graphics Hi Eric. thanks for your reply. I’m glad to know you were able to sort this out, but I recognise that you had to pay with higher fees. If you wish to have this looked into further, kindly send us a DM of your booking reference and full name. Thanks -Cy
@AloysiusOng1983 Thanks for getting in touch. So we can check this, could you please send us a DM about more details of your concern? We'll see how we can assist. Thanks - Jerry

@EB_Graphics Hi Eric, thanks for your tweet. I see you’re having trouble booking online. We have no reported outage on the website. Could you please try clearing your cache and browsing cookies, and disabling your pop-up blockers first? If the error persists, please let us know. Thanks -Cy

@jefftagle Hi Jeff thanks for your tweet. We try to ensure all flights get away on time but I’m afraid that it’s not always possible due to operational requirements and our strict safety standards. I'm sorry for any inconvenience or difficulties this meant for you on this occasion. Thanks-J

data.text: @svpercat Hi there, thanks for the tweet. I have replied to your other tweet over our Jetstar Airways twitter account. Regards - Joie
@deudpuul I can see you need assistance with misspelled names in your booking. Could you please DM (direct message) your booking reference and full name so I can take a look further on this? –M

@dregzology Hi Darren, thanks for the tweet. I understand that you are enquiring the flight status of your flight 3K 776. As of this writing, your flight is scheduled to depart until further notice. You may wish to check the flight status of the flight here: https://t.co/9hvadhsJwP. - Joie

@ayunvts61 Thanks for tagging us. Our payment system is currently working fine. Please make sure that you follow all the instruction when booking a flight using DOKU payment. You may wish to view further details on our website: https://t.co/q2elxhAyzU. Thanks – Jerry

@adeliooow Hi Pemadam, thanks for the tweet. I understand that you need assistance with correcting your name on the booking. So we could check this for you, kindly DM us your booking reference and full name. Regards - Yen
@ecp129 Thanks for getting in touch Carolyn. We've already responded to your DM. Regards - Franz

@iateana 2/2 bring a total of 10kgs of cabin baggage on-board. For further details, you may check our website here: https://t.co/HlzL7cCugc Still, we thank you for your feedback. This will surely keep our airport staff’s performance in-check. Kind Regards -Kelly

@iateana 1/2 Hi Ana, I understand that you were concerned about the other passengers' carry-on baggage. I can't comment on this as I'm unable to verify this at this stage. However, it may help to know that we do have an option to top up +3kgs of carry-on baggage so that a passenger can

data.text: @superzac Hi Zac, thanks for the tweet. I understand that you've left your iPad on-board. Are you able to DM us your booking reference and full name so we could look into this? Regards - Yen
@Richmond_Sir Thanks for your reply. Carbon Offset is not part of your original fare, you can choose to remove this extra if you would like to. I hope this helps. Thanks - Jerry

@Richmond_Sir Hi Richmond, thanks for your tweet. Fly Carbon Neutral is a program that helps the environment and is being offered during the booking process. You may check this link for your reference: https://t.co/sq9IH2tcQC -Jayme
@ritobasu_clow Hi there. Thanks for the tweet. The social media team are only able to respond to messages in English. Are you able to DM us in English so we can assist? Regards - Joie

@_jaebeomi Hi there. Thanks for your tweet. I'm glad to hear of your positive comment on your recent flight to Singapore and that you were happy with the service provided by our cabin crew manager. Kindly DM us with your full name, booking number and brief summary of your experience. - J
@usufrahil 3/3 Despite this delay, I wish you a pleasant flight to Singapore this afternoon. Thanks - Josh

@usufrahil 2/3 At Jetstar, safety is our number one priority and sometimes we will need to delay your journey based on these standards. I sincerely hope that your flight later at 3 pm will depart as scheduled.
